AttDef.BriefDescription: A base attribute for operation result hints.
Hints whose associations are objects the application should focus upon.
Specify objects that the active view should zoom to.
Specify one object that the resource browser should scroll to.
Specify objects that the resource browser should expand to show.
Specify how the selection should be modified by an operation.

Int.Name: action
Int.DetailedDescription: One of the smtk::view::SelectionAction enumerants specifying how the objects listed in the parent "selectionHint" item should be applied to the application's selection at the end of the operation.

Int.Name: value
Int.DetailedDescription: The value to add or remove to the associated components in the selection. Typically, "1" is the primary selection of an application and "2" is for hovered/highlighted items. The default is 1

Void.Name: bitwise
Void.BriefDescription: Should the "value" item be treated as a bit vector (true/enabled) which flips the provided bits to match? or as an integer (false/disabled) which overwrites the previous mapped value?

Void.Name: ephemeral
Void.BriefDescription: Should the associated components be deleted upon removal from the selection?
